name: Shooting Star (Tymski)
description:
Shooting Star is a Winter Game Jam submission for two theme words: "Star" and "Conversion". 

Theme interpretation:

  • You can convert people to dead bodies by shooting them with your gun.
  • When a player picks up a Star, he is promoted to the Sheriff.

Characters look like this:

And The Star like this:

This is local multiplayer game for up to 8 people.

Game is set in western environment.

At the first screen: Press "A" on keyboard for start! :)

Controls:

2 Players for one pad - each is moving with one analog sticks and one shoots with button A and the second is shooting with D-pad "down".

Play arena:

Github repository:

https://github.com/arturperec/ShootingStars
